I'm a freelance data journalist and data-driven storyteller. I counsel NGOs, non-profits and businesses on researching and producing data-driven stories. I give talks, trainings and workshops on data-driven storytelling techniques and best practices. I'm available to carry out academic and journalistic research. I was lead data journalist and trainer at Silk.co, a semantic web platform for publishing and visualizing data. Before, I've crafted data journalism stories and data visualizations for digital and print Italian news outlets. I privilege the use of open source tools and/or of coding. I have a background in History and a MA specializing in data journalism. I'm Italian, currently based in Amsterdam (NL).

data journalism & storytelling

I have both an academic background and several years of work experience in crafting data journalism pieces and producing data driven storytelling, with a focus on advocacy. I am comfortable with different parts of the workflow, from scraping to visualizations.

consultancy & research

Whether you have a story that needs data, data that needs a story, or an idea that needs both, I offer consultancy and research assistance to organizations interested in integrating data in their workflows and reporting.

training &
workshops

I give workshop sessions and full training courses on data journalism and data driven storytelling techniques, covering topics like data sourcing and scraping, data cleaning, data analysis for journalists, data visualization and storytelling.
